availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Baker. Father of Eliza A. Baker and John H. Baker. Married to Zelinda "Fannie" Day Baker in Harrison County on August 25, 1859. Father of Robert L. Baker. Farmer in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 135A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Colemansville, p. 94A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #000216888.
